202.description: Accepted. The operation was successfully started and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations.

200.description: OK. The workspace for Grafana resource is deleted.

202.description: Accepted. The operation is accepted and will be completed asynchronously.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Operation URI for long running operation.

204.description: No Content. The resource is not present or was already deleted.

WorkspaceNameParameter.description: The workspace name of Azure Managed Grafana.

ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.name: managedPrivateEndpointName
ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.description: The managed private endpoint name of Azure Managed Grafana.

IntegrationFabricNameParameter.name: integrationFabricName
IntegrationFabricNameParameter.description: The integration fabric name of Azure Managed Grafana.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The ID of an ongoing async operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

id.description: ARM id of the grafana resource

type.description: The type of the grafana resource.

sku.description: The Sku of the grafana resource.

properties.description: Properties specific to the grafana resource.

identity.description: The managed identity of the grafana resource.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this grafana resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the grafana resource lives

ManagedGrafanaProperties.description: Properties specific to the grafana resource.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of the Grafana instance.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Indicate the state for enable or disable traffic over the public interface.

zoneRedundancy.description: The zone redundancy setting of the Grafana instance.

apiKey.description: The api key setting of the Grafana instance.

deterministicOutboundIP.description: Whether a Grafana instance uses deterministic outbound IPs.

outboundIPs.description: List of outbound IPs if deterministicOutboundIP is enabled.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The private endpoint connections of the Grafana instance.

autoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: Scope for dns deterministic name hash calculation.

grafanaPlugins.description: Installed plugin list of the Grafana instance. Key is plugin id, value is plugin definition.

grafanaMajorVersion.description: The major Grafana software version to target.

ManagedGrafanaUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for a PATCH request to a grafana resource.

identity.description: The managed identity of the grafana resource.

tags.description: The new tags of the grafana resource.

properties.description: Properties specific to the managed grafana resource.

ManagedGrafanaPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The properties parameters for a PATCH request to a grafana resource.

zoneRedundancy.description: The zone redundancy setting of the Grafana instance.

apiKey.description: The api key setting of the Grafana instance.

deterministicOutboundIP.description: Whether a Grafana instance uses deterministic outbound IPs.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Indicate the state for enable or disable traffic over the public interface.

grafanaPlugins.description: Update of Grafana plugin. Key is plugin id, value is plugin definition. If plugin definition is null, plugin with given plugin id will be removed. Otherwise, given plugin will be installed.

grafanaMajorVersion.description: The major Grafana software version to target.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Indicate the state for enable or disable traffic over the public interface.

AutoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: Scope for dns deterministic name hash calculation

GrafanaConfigurations.description: Server configurations of a Grafana instance

enabled.description: Enable this to allow Grafana to send email. Default is false

host.description: SMTP server hostname with port, e.g. test.email.net:587

password.description: Password of SMTP auth. If the password contains # or ;, then you have to wrap it with triple quotes

fromAddress.description:
Address used when sending out emails
https://pkg.go.dev/net/mail#Address

fromName.description:
Name to be used when sending out emails. Default is "Azure Managed Grafana Notification"
https://pkg.go.dev/net/mail#Address

skipVerify.description:
Verify SSL for SMTP server. Default is false
https://pkg.go.dev/crypto/tls#Config

externalEnabled.description: Set to false to disable external snapshot publish endpoint

viewersCanEdit.description: Set to true so viewers can access and use explore and perform temporary edits on panels in dashboards they have access to. They cannot save their changes.

csrfAlwaysCheck.description: Set to true to execute the CSRF check even if the login cookie is not in a request (default false).

StartTLSPolicy.description:
The StartTLSPolicy setting of the SMTP configuration
https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/go-mail/mail#StartTLSPolicy

GrafanaIntegrations.description: GrafanaIntegrations is a bundled observability experience (e.g. pre-configured data source, tailored Grafana dashboards, alerting defaults) for common monitoring scenarios.

azureMonitorWorkspaceResourceId.description: The resource Id of the connected Azure Monitor Workspace.

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

groupIds.description: The private endpoint connection group ids.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: List of private endpoint connection associated with the specified storage account

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: The private link resource Private link DNS zone name.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Properties of a private link resource.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources

EnterpriseConfigurations.description: Enterprise settings of a Grafana instance

marketplacePlanId.description: The Plan Id of the Azure Marketplace subscription for the Enterprise plugins

MarketplaceAutoRenew.description: The AutoRenew setting of the Enterprise subscription

EnterpriseDetails.description: Enterprise details of a Grafana instance

SaasSubscriptionDetails.description: SaaS subscription details of a Grafana instance

planId.description: The plan Id of the SaaS subscription.

offerId.description: The offer Id of the SaaS subscription.

publisherId.description: The publisher Id of the SaaS subscription.

term.description: The billing term of the SaaS Subscription.

SubscriptionTerm.description: The current billing term of the SaaS Subscription.

termUnit.description: The unit of the billing term.

startDate.description: The date and time in UTC of when the billing term starts.

endDate.description: The date and time in UTC of when the billing term ends.

MarketplaceTrialQuota.description: The allocation details of the per subscription free trial slot of the subscription.

availablePromotion.description: Available enterprise promotion for the subscription

grafanaResourceId.description: Resource Id of the Grafana resource which is doing the trial.

trialStartAt.description: The date and time in UTC of when the trial starts.

trialEndAt.description: The date and time in UTC of when the trial ends.

ManagedPrivateEndpointModel.description: The managed private endpoint resource type.

ManagedPrivateEndpointModelProperties.description: Properties specific to the managed private endpoint.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the resource for which the managed private endpoint is pointing to.

privateLinkResourceRegion.description: The region of the resource to which the managed private endpoint is pointing to.

groupIds.description: The group Ids of the managed private endpoint.

requestMessage.description: User input request message of the managed private endpoint.

privateLinkServiceUrl.description: The URL of the data store behind the private link service. It would be the URL in the Grafana data source configuration page without the protocol and port.

privateLinkServicePrivateIP.description: The private IP of private endpoint after approval. This property is empty before connection is approved.

ManagedPrivateEndpointModelListResponse.description: The list of managed private endpoints of a grafana resource

ManagedPrivateEndpointConnectionState.description: The state of managed private endpoint connection.

description.description: Gets or sets the reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

ManagedPrivateEndpointConnectionStatus.description: The approval/rejection status of managed private endpoint connection.

ManagedPrivateEndpointUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for a PATCH request to a managed private endpoint.

tags.description: The new tags of the managed private endpoint.

targetResourceId.description: The resource Id of the Azure resource being integrated with Azure Managed Grafana. E.g., an Azure Kubernetes Service cluster.

dataSourceResourceId.description: The resource Id of the Azure resource which is used to configure Grafana data source. E.g., an Azure Monitor Workspace, an Azure Data Explorer cluster, etc.

scenarios.description: A list of integration scenarios covered by this integration fabric

IntegrationFabricUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for a PATCH request to a Integration Fabric resource.

tags.description: The new tags of the Integration Fabric resource.

properties.description: The new properties of this Integration Fabric resource

scenarios.description: The new integration scenarios covered by this integration fabric.

AzureEntityResource.title: Entity Resource
AzureEntityResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates if the resource name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the given name is not available.

message.description: Detailed reason why the given name is available.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ErrorResponse.title: Error response
ErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

identity.description: The client ID of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

Operation.title: REST API Operation
Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

OperationStatusResult.description: The current status of an async operation.

id.description: Fully qualified ID for the async operation.

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

error.description: If present, details of the operation error.

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

ProxyResource.title: Proxy Resource
ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will not have tags and a location

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ResourceModelWithAllowedPropertySet.description: The resource model definition containing the full set of allowed properties for a resource. Except properties bag, there cannot be a top level property outside of this set.

managedBy.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the resource that manages this resource. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource. If this is present, complete mode deployment will not delete the resource if it is removed from the template since it is managed by another resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

etag.description: The etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

SkuTier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

TrackedResource.title: Tracked Resource
TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

encryptionProperties.description: Configuration of key for data encryption

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for container registry.

locationData.description: Metadata pertaining to the geographic location of the resource.

name.description: A canonical name for the geographic or physical location.

city.description: The city or locality where the resource is located.

district.description: The district, state, or province where the resource is located.

countryOrRegion.description: The country or region where the resource is located

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
